uno.network.api

Interface IClientMessageListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameClient, Main, TestClient

    public interface IClientMessageListener
    The listener interface for receiving events from the network thread

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnect()
      Called when a connection has been established
      void onDisconnect(java.lang.String reason)
      Called when the connection to the server is disconnected
      void onError(MessageType type, java.lang.String message)
      Called when an error occurs on either the server side related to the client or on the client
      void onMessageReceived(MessageType type, java.lang.Object message)
      Called when a message is received from the server

    • Method Detail

      • onConnect

        void onConnect()
        Called when a connection has been established

      • onDisconnect

        void onDisconnect(java.lang.String reason)
        Called when the connection to the server is disconnected
        Parameters:
        reason - The reason for the disconnect

      • onError

        void onError(MessageType type,
             java.lang.String message)
        Called when an error occurs on either the server side related to the client or on the client
        Parameters:
        type - The type of error that occurred
        message - A message explaining the error

      • onMessageReceived

        void onMessageReceived(MessageType type,
                       java.lang.Object message)
        Called when a message is received from the server
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the message that is received
        message - The message that was received
